SDP Documentation

This is an implementation of the dual only, potential reduction interior point method for optimizing the second order density matrix using the P, Q, G and T_1 N-representability conditions. Compiling can be done with the options PQ, PQG and PQGT1, with logical consequences for the program.

Author:
Brecht Verstichel
Date:
22-02-2010
